VLAD4.original: ~s~Hold ~INPUT_SPRINT~ while climbing a ladder to climb faster.
VLAD4.translated: ~s~爬梯子时按住~INPUT_SPRINT~可以爬得更快。

VLAD4.original: ~s~When an enemy's icon flashes between blue and red you have the choice between killing them and letting them live. Your decision could have repercussions.
VLAD4.translated: ~s~当敌人的标志出现红蓝闪烁时，你可以选择杀死或放过对方，你的决定可能会对后续情节造成影响。

VLAD4.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_JUMP~ while running to jump between buildings.
VLAD4.translated: ~s~奔跑时按~INPUT_JUMP~可以在建筑之间跳跃。

VLAD4.original: ~r~Ivan~s~ is already making an escape. Chase him.
~s~Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ to mount the ladder. Use ~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~ to move up and down on the ladder.
VLAD4.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_ENTER~登上梯子，用~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~在梯子上攀爬。

VLAD4.original: ~s~Use the ladders to chase Ivan through the building site.
~r~Ivan~s~ is escaping into the construction site. Chase him.
~s~Press ~INPUT_JUMP~ to climb over objects or walls.
~s~Use ~INPUT_SPRINT~ while climbing a ladder to climb faster.
~s~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to help Ivan up. Press ~INPUT_MELEE_KICK~ to kick Ivan off the edge.
